mapper.sql: STORAGEID, COMMODITYID, STORAGENUM, STARTNUM, ENDNUM, OPERATORID, WAREHOUSEAUDITORID, MARKETAUDITORID, STORAGESTATE, STORAGEDATE, WAREHOUSEID, MAPPERBILLID
STORAGEID, COMMODITYID, STORAGENUM, STARTNUM, ENDNUM, OPERATORID, WAREHOUSEAUDITORID, MARKETAUDITORID, STORAGESTATE, STORAGEDATE, WAREHOUSEID, MAPPERBILLID,STORAGECOUNTS,TRANSFERSTATUS
mapper.update: update IPO_STORAGE set COMMODITYID= #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGENUM = #{storagenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTNUM =#{startnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDNUM= #{endnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSEAUDITORID =#{warehouseauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKETAUDITORID= #{marketauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGESTATE =#{storagestate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORAGEDATE = #{storagedate,jdbcType=DATE}, WAREHOUSEID =#{warehouseid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAPPERBILLID =#{mapperbillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGECOUNTS =#{storagecounts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSFERSTATUS =#{transferstate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where STORAGEID = #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT T.WAREHOUSEID FROM W_USER T WHERE T.USERID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT B.ID FROM BI_WAREHOUSE B WHERE B.WAREHOUSEID=(SELECT U.WAREHOUSEID FROM W_USER U WHERE U.USERID=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT t.* ,c.commodityname,c.pubmemberid,c.counts,c.contractfactor,c.price,b.name publishername from IPO_STORAGE t left join ipo_commodity_conf c on t.commodityid = c.commodityid left join br_broker b on c.pubmemberid = b.brokerid where STORAGEID=#{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
